subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ryan Giggs and Park Ji-Sung each scored goals to lead Manchester United a comfortable 2-0 win at Middlesbrough on Saturday and extend its lead in the English Premier League to 6 points with four games remaining.
snippet: Ryan Giggs and Park Ji-Sung each scored goals to lead Manchester United a comfortable 2-0 win at Middlesbrough on Saturday and extend its lead in the English Premier League to 6 points with four games remaining.
